Articles.Content:
In the moment i try to load a saved ship the entire game freeze but i can ear the background sounds and move the cursor 

The problem is probaly not hardware because the ram and cpu usage remain invariate, and i'm pretty sure this problem emerged when i loaded some other mods.
If someone tell me witch mod is conflitting i would be very gratefoul.

Here is a list of all the mods i have installed trough CKAN:

Edited September 10, 2022 by Mario13219

Hey, I'm experiencing this issue too. Can't get any of my craft to load. 

I've uninstalled all my mods that I installed since the last time the game was running correclty. I'm suspecting that it was related to a bunch of updates that I did at the same time so I'm starting to think one of them is the culprit. There was definitely an update to RO so that is my next suspect.

 

Edit: I think I foudn the solution, I downgraded KSPCF and it's working now. 

Edited September 10, 2022 by internerd

1 hour ago, internerd said:

Hey, I'm experiencing this issue too. Can't get any of my craft to load. 

I've uninstalled all my mods that I installed since the last time the game was running correclty. I'm suspecting that it was related to a bunch of updates that I did at the same time so I'm starting to think one of them is the culprit. There was definitely an update to RO so that is my next suspect.

 

Edit: I think I foudn the solution, I downgraded KSPCF and it's working now. 

Thanks now it work fine
